channel.title: Crypto News - SosoValue Research
channel.description: Latest crypto news from SosoValue Research

item.title: US banking lobby asks OCC to hold off on approving crypto firms’ banking chartersReported on July 21 that according to Cointelegraph, the American Bankers Association, together with several banks and credit union groups, wrote to the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) on July 18, requesting a delay in approving banking license applications from crypto companies such as Circle and Ripple. These institutions questioned the "fundamental deviation" from traditional policies of the trust bank model proposed by crypto companies, pointing out that their business plans lacked detailed information that could be evaluated by the public. The focus of the dispute is whether the national trust bank license applied for by the crypto company is compliant. The banking group stressed that digital asset custody does not belong to the traditional trust business, and if approved, it will lead to problems such as unfair capital requirements. Caitlin Long, founder of the crypto bank Custodia, pointed out that the dispute may lead to litigation and questioned whether traditional banks may evade regulation by turning into trust companies in the future. [PANews]

Deposits are now open, and withdrawals will be open on July 22 at 13:00 (SGT). [Techflow]

item.title: Binance: Users holding at least 210 Binance Alpha Points can claim TA token airdropOn July 21, according to the official announcement, Binance released an update on the launch of Trusta AI (TA), stating that after the start of trading, users holding at least 210 Binance Alpha points can apply for a 750 TA token airdrop. First come, first served, until the airdrop pool is full or the event ends. Please note that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha points. Users must confirm the claim within 24 hours on the Alpha event page, otherwise it will be deemed to have given up the airdrop. Starting today, the risk pre-check for airdrop activities will be opened 5 minutes before the start, please prepare in advance. [PANews]

item.title: Binance Alpha: The TA airdrop claim threshold is 210 points, and claiming will consume 15 points.Binance has announced that TA trading will be available on Binance Alpha on July 21, 2025 at 7:00 (UTC), and futures trading will begin at 7:30. At that time, users holding at least 210 Binance Alpha points can get an airdrop of 750 TA tokens on a first-come, first-served basis, which will end when the airdrop pool is exhausted or the event expires. Claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha points, and users need to confirm the application on the Alpha event page within 24 hours, otherwise it will be deemed as a waiver. Binance will conduct an airdrop risk pre-check 5 minutes before the start of the event, so please be prepared in advance. [Odaily]

item.title: Bitget Launches Trading Lucky Draw with Up to 3 ETH to be WonTo celebrate Ethereum's strong comeback, Bitget is launching a trading lucky draw event, open to both new and existing users. During the event, complete the corresponding contract trading volume tasks to get a specific number of chances to win a prize, up to 11 times. Each additional draw increases the chance of winning a grand prize, with a maximum of 3 ETH per draw. [Foresight News]

item.title: MyStonks and BIT Reach Strategic Partnership to Accelerate Deep Integration of Digital Assets and Traditional SecuritiesMyStonks announces a deep strategic partnership with global professional digital asset trading platform BIT. MyStonks is a leading global decentralized US stock token platform, and BIT focuses on providing digital asset services to global users. This collaboration marks an important upgrade to the on-chain securities and crypto asset trading ecosystem. This round of cooperation will cover multiple levels, including API integration, traffic referral, joint construction of agent channels, and dual community linkage. The two parties will bring users a convenient cross-platform jump experience, exclusive transaction discounts, and diverse interactive activities, and plan to integrate MyStonks digital securities products on the BIT platform in the future to promote the continuous implementation of one-stop on-chain financial services. This strong alliance will not only help both parties improve service coverage and market influence, but also accelerate the deep integration of digital assets and traditional securities, bringing investors more efficient and diverse asset allocation choices and innovative experiences. [Odaily]

item.title: LBank has integrated xStocks to enable coin-stock tradingAccording to official news, LBank has integrated xStocks and launched tokenized stock asset trading. The first batch of popular targets, MSTRX and CRCLX, have been listed in the XSTOCKS trading area, and users can directly trade with USDT. The coin-stock trading provided by LBank supports 24/7 trading, breaking through the trading time and geographical restrictions of traditional stock markets, allowing global users to participate at any time, making asset allocation more flexible. [Odaily News]

item.title: Data: In the past 24 hours, Top figures have been following projects such as polycule, Hyperbeat, and DubDub.According to RootData X dynamic data, in the past 24 hours: The Polymarket event trading platform polycule has been followed by a16z co-founder Marc Andreessen, Electric Capital co-founder Avichal Garg, CoinFund founder Jake Brukhman, and others. The Hyperliquid-based expansion protocol Hyperbeat has been followed by angel investor DCF GOD, Aperture founding partner Kay Fong, crypto influencer Stephen, and others. The cryptocurrency mobile wallet HaHa has been followed by the Web3 hackathon ETHDenver. The Meme launch platform DubDub has been followed by Taproot Wizards co-founder Udi Wertheimer. The DeFi lending protocol Takara Lend has been followed by crypto trader Yuyue, crypto KOL spark, and others. [ChainCatcher]

item.title: AguilaTrades turns bullish on ETH again, with current cumulative losses exceeding $27.00M.According to Lookonchain monitoring, AguilaTrades has completely closed its ETH short positions, losing over $8.00M, and then switched back to long ETH. Previously, its profit and loss on Hyperliquid experienced ups and downs: it had accumulated losses of over $35.00M before turning losses into profits, gaining over $3.00M in profit, and now it has fallen back to accumulated losses of over $27.00M. [Odaily]

item.title: Hong Kong-listed 4Paradigm and 9Yards Technology jointly released a "Stablecoin Underlying Asset Management Solution" for the stablecoin ecosystem.According to Sina Finance, Hong Kong-listed company 4Paradigm has reached a strategic cooperation with fixed-income fintech platform Nine Chapters Technology, and jointly released a "Stablecoin Underlying Asset Management Solution" specifically for the stablecoin ecosystem. The solution combines 4Paradigm's AI capabilities with Nine Chapters Technology's fixed-income portfolio management experience, aiming to jointly develop the stablecoin market, fill the lack of compliant, secure, and intelligent asset management systems in the stablecoin investment field, promote the construction of intelligent infrastructure for the stablecoin ecosystem, and thereby accelerate the pilot and implementation of stablecoin compliance products. [Foresight News]

item.title: BitMart Officially Launches New Staking Loan FeatureAccording to official news, BitMart has officially launched a new staking loan feature, allowing users to obtain instant loan amounts by staking their existing assets, thereby increasing capital liquidity without the need for realization. In addition, BitMart has simultaneously launched a limited-time event: new users can enjoy a 50% subsidy on loan interest, and some users can even get up to 100% full repayment, achieving a "zero interest rate" loan experience; in addition, there is also a chance to get up to 1,000.00 USDC reward. [Odaily]
